disasters.title: Moderate Earthquake in Northern California
disasters.description: A magnitude 4.7 earthquake struck northern California, causing light damage to some structures. No injuries reported.

disasters.title: Severe Flooding in Central Europe
disasters.description: Heavy rainfall has caused the Vltava River to overflow, flooding parts of Prague and surrounding areas. Evacuations underway.

disasters.title: Wildfire in Southern Australia
disasters.description: A fast-moving wildfire has burned over 5,000 hectares of land near Adelaide. Multiple communities threatened, emergency evacuations in progress.

disasters.title: Tropical Storm Approaching Philippines
disasters.description: Tropical Storm Aghon is approaching the Philippine islands with wind speeds of up to 85 km/h. Expected to make landfall within 24 hours.

disasters.title: Landslide in Himalayan Region
disasters.description: Heavy monsoon rains triggered a major landslide near Kathmandu. Several villages affected, rescue operations ongoing.

disasters.title: Minor Earthquake in Japan
disasters.description: A magnitude 3.6 earthquake was recorded near Tokyo. No damage reported.

disasters.title: Industrial Chemical Spill
disasters.description: A chemical spill has occurred at an industrial facility on the outskirts of London. Local authorities have established a safety perimeter.

disasters.title: Flash Flooding in Arizona
disasters.description: Sudden heavy rainfall has caused flash flooding in parts of Phoenix and surrounding areas. Several roads closed.

disasters.title: Severe Winter Storm in Northeast
disasters.description: A severe winter storm bringing heavy snow and high winds has hit the Northeastern United States. Power outages reported across the region.

disasters.title: Forest Fire in Southern Europe
disasters.description: A forest fire has broken out in the hills north of Athens. Firefighting teams are responding.
